Plot: Ashley Thomas knows your every emotion. She thinks it's a curse. To others, it's a weapon. Meeting a stranger in the woods who's unlike anyone she's met before, sparks her curiosity, and her caution. Learning Druson is a new student at her school, she tries to stay under his radar as she finds out what she can about him, but his attention zeros in on her and it quickly becomes obvious he has a motive. His secrets are kept close, until his enemy arrives, and all that he's hidden becomes exposed. Caught between the two, a dangerous game ensues when her gift is used to find a weapon that holds too much power for anyone to possess. She must determine whom she can trust, when the reality of what they are capable of threaten her and everything she holds dear.
